unittitle_ssm: Art Seidenberg collection of Prospect Park and Erasmus Hall High School postcards
abstract_ssm: The collection contains the postcards of Art Seidenberg, dating from approximately 1900 to 1929. They document  the landscape, monuments, and structures of Prospect Park, the building and events of Erasmus Hall High School, and other buildings in Brooklyn.
collection_ssm: Art Seidenberg collection of Prospect Park and Erasmus Hall High School postcards
heading_ssm: Art Seidenberg collection of Prospect Park and Erasmus Hall High School postcards

collection_sim: Art Seidenberg collection of Prospect Park and Erasmus Hall High School postcards
